Feedback Text: The report builder is slow when dealing with large datasets. Takes over 2 minutes to load reports with 50k+ records.
Love the new mobile interface! Much easier to update opportunities on the go.
Gmail integration keeps disconnecting. Have to re-authenticate every few days which is frustrating.
Would love to see more customization options for dashboards. Currently too limited.
Duplicate contact detection is excellent! Saved us hours of cleanup work.
API rate limits are too restrictive for our integration needs. Need at least 2x current limits.
The new AI lead scoring feature is a game changer. Our conversion rate improved 15%.
Page load times have gotten worse since the last update. Homepage takes 8+ seconds.
Workflow builder UI is confusing. Needs better documentation and templates.
Love the quarterly forecasting view but wish we could customize the time periods.
Two-factor authentication setup was seamless. Great security improvements!
CSV exports are missing some custom fields. Would like option to export all fields.
The new UI is modern but the learning curve is steep. More onboarding tutorials needed.
Outlook calendar sync is perfect. No more double booking meetings!
Global search doesn't find contacts by phone number. This should be added.
Kanban-style pipeline view is exactly what we needed. Very intuitive.
Chat support response time is amazing. Got help within 2 minutes!
Custom report sharing permissions are too complex. Need simpler role-based options.
Product catalog import from Shopify failed multiple times. Need better error messages.
Automatic activity logging from email is brilliant. Saves so much manual work.
Territory management tools are too basic. Need hierarchical territory support.
Einstein recommendations are hit or miss. Sometimes suggests completely irrelevant contacts.
Offline mode on mobile is fantastic for field sales. Can work anywhere!
Need ability to create custom objects without admin help. Current process is too slow.
Built-in training modules are helpful but need more advanced content for power users.
